notes: Each image is referenced by exactly one lesson, case study, or simulator. No duplicates allowed.

images.description: Satellite image of the Nile Delta showing distributary channels, coastal erosion, and the Aswan Dam reservoir (Lake Nasser)
Arctic sea ice extent comparison map showing September minimum extent in 1979 vs. recent decades with annotated albedo values
Aerial photograph of Lagos metropolis showing density gradient from central business district to informal settlements and coastal reclamation
Map of the 2011 Tōhoku earthquake and tsunami showing epicentre, plate boundary, inundation zone extent, and wave travel times
PRODES deforestation map of the Brazilian Amazon showing cleared areas by decade from 1970 to present with biome boundaries
Plate tectonic movement simulator interface showing cross-section diagram of an oceanic-continental convergent boundary with controls
World map displaying Köppen climate zone boundaries with colour-coded regions and CO₂ concentration slider control
Population growth simulator showing demographic transition model graph alongside a population pyramid for a selected country
Water cycle simulator diagram illustrating precipitation, evapotranspiration, runoff, and groundwater flow with land cover controls
Animated synoptic weather chart simulator showing frontal system development with pressure gradient and sea surface temperature inputs
